thread.title: Pregnant Chelsee Healey cried when she found out she was expecting 'unplanned baby' with jailbird boyfriend Jack Malloy
thread.title_full: Pregnant Chelsee Healey cried when she found out she was expecting 'unplanned baby' with jailbird boyfriend Jack Malloy

author: Vicki Newman
title: Pregnant Chelsee Healey cried when she found out she was expecting 'unplanned baby' with jailbird boyfriend Jack Malloy
text:
Pregnant Chelsee Healey cried when she found out she was expecting 'unplanned baby' with boyfriend Jack Malloy The actress said the pregnancy wasn't planned and came as a shock - but she couldn't be happier Share Chelsee Healey cried when she found out she was expecting a baby with boyfriend Jack Malloy (Photo: OK) Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Chelsee Healey cried tears of joy when she found out she was expecting a baby - even though it came as quite a shock. 
The star is pregnant with her first child with boyfriend Jack Malloy - and reveals she burst into tears when the test came back positive. 
The couple are due to welcome their little one into the world on July 16, and although the pregnancy wasn't planned, they couldn't be happier. 
The Waterloo Road star, 28, told OK! magazine : "When I saw the test was positive I started crying, but they were happy tears. Read More Hollyoaks actress Chelsee Healey is overjoyed to be having a baby with on-off boyfriend Jack Malloy Chelsee and Jack weren't planning a baby but couldn't be happier (Photo: OK) 
"It wasn’t something we’d planned but now we are having a baby we couldn’t be happier." 
Jack added: "It was definitely a shock but I was over the moon when she told me. I think it’s still sinking in, I can’t wait to be a dad." 
Chelsee's on-off boyfriend Jack has been labelled a 'bad boy' after serving time in jail. 
The couple split up in July as Chelsee struggled to cope when he was jailed for 12 months in November 2015 for dangerous driving, using a vehicle without insurance and driving while disqualified. They talk about the pregnancy in this week's OK! (Photo: OK) 
They're back together however, and happier than ever. 
But Chelsee says it upsets her when people label Jack a 'bad boy'. 
She said: "It can be a bit upsetting because he’s really not. Jack has been tarnished because of the mistakes he has made in the past, but everyone makes mistakes. It’s a shame that people jump to conclusions about him because he’s a great guy, we’re very happy together. 
"Jack is the only man who has ever felt like my best friend as well as my boyfriend." Read More Chelsee Healey blasts rumours of split from bad boy Jack Malloy - and admits she's getting broody Chelsee find it upsetting when people label Jack a 'bad boy' (Photo: Instagram) 
On what kind of mum she would like to be, Chelsee said: "My mum is my best friend so I’d love to have that relationship with my child." 
She added that she knows she'll be "obsessed" with her child and that she has a lot of love to give. 
Jack says "hard-working" Chelsee will be a great mum and that he's always telling her how proud he is of her. Like us on Facebook
